mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_remind ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_brokerage_sa_id, visa_id, brokerage_sa_id, remind_date) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{schoolBrokerageSaId}, #{visaId}, #{brokerageSaId}, #{remindDate});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, school_brokerage_sa_id AS schoolBrokerageSaId, remind_date AS remindDate FROM b_remind WHERE school_brokerage_sa_id = #{schoolBrokerageSaId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;
SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, visa_id AS visaId, remind_date AS remindDate FROM b_remind WHERE visa_id = #{visaId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, brokerage_sa_id AS brokerageSaId, remind_date AS remindDate FROM b_remind WHERE brokerage_sa_id = #{brokerageSaId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, school_brokerage_sa_id AS schoolBrokerageSaId, visa_id AS visaId, brokerage_sa_id AS brokerageSaId, remind_date AS remindDate FROM b_remind WHERE remind_date < #{date} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;
